org.jpws.pwslib.crypto

Class BlowfishCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.pwslib.crypto.BlowfishCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PwsCipher

    public class BlowfishCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements PwsCipher
    This class allows to instantiate Blowfish ciphers of different operation modi, conforming to the PwsCipher interface. Available are "ECB" and "CBC" modi. Crypting methods of this class are synchronised.

    NOTE that the Blowfish ciphers supplied here are a special version for the PWS file format and, as is, not compatible with Schneier's regular Blowfish algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.jpws.pwslib.crypto.PwsCipher

      Blowfish ECB cipher with specified key source.
      BlowfishCipher(byte[] key, byte[] init)
      Blowfish CBC cipher with specified key source and CBC IV value.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        byte[] decrypted data block (same length as buffer)

        output - byte[] plain-text data block
        length - int length of data to be translated (bytes)
